title: How bad is booze?
description: Are you a teetotaler or a drinker? Rob and Alice discuss what risk to your health regular drinking may have

vocabItems.definition: the headache and sickness you can feel after drinking too much alcohol
the belief that drinking more alcohol when you already have a hangover will make you feel better

vocabItems.word: don't knock it until you've tried it
vocabItems.definition: try something before you criticize it
doubtful about whether something is true or not
the process in which yeast or bacteria change sugar to alcohol
